mapper.select: select o_ref, o_title, o_sender, o_regdate, o_deadline, deliveryState from ordering
select o_ref, o_title, o_deadline, o_regdate, o_sendDate, o_receiver, o_sender, o_note, senderSign, receiverSign, deliveryState from ordering where o_ref = #{o_ref}
select o_reStep, pro_name, pro_container, pro_volume, o_count from orderingPro where o_ref = #{o_ref}
mapper.insert: insert into ordering(o_ref, o_title, o_deadline,o_regdate, o_sender, o_receiver, o_note, senderSign) values(Ordering_o_ref.NEXTVAL,#{o_title},#{o_deadline}, SYSDATE,#{o_sender},#{o_receiver},#{o_note},#{senderSign})

INSERT INTO orderingPro( o_reStep, pro_name, pro_container, pro_volume, o_count ) VALUES
( OrderingPro_o_reStep.NEXTVAL,#{item.pro_name}, #{item.pro_container}, #{item.pro_volume}, #{item.o_count})
